title: Futuristic Sci-Fi User Interface 2
description: The Futuristic SciFi UI SFX 2 pack is made to give the player the immediate feel of being in a futuristic sci-fi environment right from the menu or navigation screen before even entering the game.
longDescription: The Futuristic SciFi UI SFX 2 pack is made to be an essential pack of sounds to quickly bring life to any Futuristic or Sci-fi game though sound. These sounds can be used for user interface, computers, machines robots, vehicle or spacecraft interiors and much more. The pack is made of of sounds consisting of similar tonal elements to seamlessly blend together. Having an overall tone and theme that is consistent though out your project is key to the overall users experience. This is a must have SFX pack in your tool belt when creating futuristic and or sci-fi game play and user interface.
technicalDetails:
DEMO LINK HERE

https://soundcloud.com/pro-audiosfx/futuristic-sci-fi-ui-2?si=ff4caa37385e40fa80b9a903ab5c3f72&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing


This asset pack consists of main folders of Sci-Fi UI sound sets

  •  TONE 1 - 19 FILES
  •  TONE 2 - 5 FILES
  •  TONE 3 - 8 FILES
  •  TONE 4 - 10 FILES
  •  TONE 5 - 24 FILES
  •  TONE 6 - 12 FILES 
  •  TONE 7 - 11 FILES
  •  TONE 8 - 17 FILES
  •  EXTRAS - 16 FILES (WITH SIMILAR TONES TO FOLDERS ABOVE) 

Number of Audio Waves: 122

Number of Audio Cues: 122

Sample rate / bit rate: 48,000 Hz 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 2:37

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
